analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose the proposed establishment of the new personnel schedule as the at will nature of the position will undoubtedly lead to turnover in such positions that will be as frequent as each time Schedule C leadership changes, even within a four year term of the President.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the loss of expertise and the potential for increased politicization and instability within the federal service, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process.
